attr.title: Super Mutant Alien Assault
attr.desc: The Citizen Kane of Super Crate Box clones - dance with death through randomised rooms to clear your space freighter of irradiated aliens in a brutal arcade platformer shooter stuffed to the brim with unlockable weapons, explosives, special abilities and defense moves.
attr.inst:
Purchase your game from steam.
Download the game and place SuperMutantAlienAssault.exe in ports/supermutantalienassault/
attr.inst_md:
Purchase your game from [steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/368680/Super_Mutant_Alien_Assault/).
Download the game and place SuperMutantAlienAssault.exe in ports/supermutantalienassault/
